title: How to Keep Meta AI From Using Your Instagram Data for Training

steps.title: There is no way to opt out of Meta AI in the US.
steps.content: There is no way to opt out of Meta AI in the US. Since the US doesn't have strict data protection laws like the EU and the UK, Instagram will not let you opt out of Meta AI. According to Meta's generative AI policy, Meta can use any publicly posted information (including posts and photos) to train Meta AI. [1] X Research source

steps.title: There are a few workarounds to keep your information away from Meta AI.
steps.content: There are a few workarounds to keep your information away from Meta AI. These workarounds are as follows: The best way to ensure your data won't be used to train Meta AI is to set your profile to private. [2] X Research source The downsides to this are that your past public data is still fair game, and if someone shares your data publicly, it can be used by Meta AI. Another workaround that may or may not work is to submit a Data Subject Rights form to Meta. To do this, go to this form and fill it out with as much information as you can or want to provide. Filling out this form may or may not help, as Facebook uses local jurisdiction to make a decision for each request, and your data isn't protected as strictly in the US.

steps.title: Go to Meta's AI objection form.
steps.content: Go to Meta's AI objection form. You can find this in the app by going to Settings > About > Privacy policy . You can also find it by clicking here .

steps.title: Fill out the form with your information.
steps.content: Fill out the form with your information. In the section where Meta asks why their data processing affects you, write that you are exercising your right under data protection laws to object. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Submit the form.
steps.content: Submit the form. You should get an email a few moments after submitting the form to confirm that your request was successful.

steps.title: Check the privacy center on the Instagram app.
steps.content: Check the privacy center on the Instagram app. Each country or region will have different data protection laws. To see if you are able to opt out of Meta AI on Instagram where you live, go to the privacy center in the Instagram app to see if you're eligible to object to your data being scraped for AI. To get to the privacy center, go to your profile, tap the three-line button in the upper-right corner, then scroll down to find Privacy Center . If you cannot opt out of Meta AI, consider following the workarounds above to keep your data away from Meta AI.

steps.title: The Meta AI chatbot cannot be disabled from the search bar.
steps.content: The Meta AI chatbot cannot be disabled from the search bar. However, you can mute the Meta AI chatbot so it's less annoying when you're using Instagram. To disable the Meta AI chatbot, follow these steps: [4] X Research source Tap the magnifying glass button at the bottom of the screen. Tap the search bar, where you'll see a blue circle icon. Tap the blue arrow button in the upper-right corner of the screen. Tap the white "i" icon in the upper-right corner of the screen. Select Mute . Toggle on Mute messages . Choose Until I change it to mute the Meta AI chatbot indefinitely.
